postService.title: Create a Service Offer
postService.subtitle: Showcase your skills and attract customers

basicInfo.title: Service Title
basicInfo.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe what you offer, your experience, and what makes you special...
basicInfo.serviceAreaPlaceholder: Describe areas you cover or any location preferences

review.title: Review Your Offer
review.description: Please review all details before publishing your service

success.servicePostedDescription: Your service is now live and customers can book it.

errors.locationRequired: Please add an address to your profile first
errors.basePriceRequired: Base price is required for fixed pricing
errors.hourlyRateRequired: Hourly rate is required for hourly pricing
errors.minimumBookingGreaterThanZero: Minimum booking must be greater than 0
errors.notLoggedIn: Please login to create a service
errors.customersCannotPost: Customers cannot create services. Please switch to a tasker account.
errors.loadFormDataFailed: Failed to load form data. Please try again.
errors.loadAddressesFailed: Failed to load addresses. Please try again.
errors.incompleteProfileDescription: Please complete your profile setup to continue

step1.title: Service Details
step1.description: Tell us about the service you want to offer
step1.addProfilePhoto: Add a profile photo to build trust with customers
step1.workingHoursManaged: Working hours are managed in your profile settings
step1.noAvailability: No availability set. Please add your working hours in your profile first.
step1.noAddresses: No addresses found. Please add an address in your profile first.

step2.title: Pricing & Policies
step2.description: Set your pricing and booking policies
step2.minBookingHint: Leave empty if no minimum time required
step2.estimatedDurationHint: How long do you expect this service typically takes?

tips.title: Tips for Success
tips.tip1: Be specific about what you offer and what's included
tips.tip2: Set competitive but fair pricing based on your experience
tips.tip3: Add a professional profile photo to build trust
tips.tip4: Add extras to increase your earning potential

help.title: Need help?
help.description: Our support team is here to help you create the perfect service listing.
